scripts.build:mcp: tsup src/mastra/stdio.ts --format esm,cjs --no-splitting --dts && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/stdio.mjs > temp && mv temp dist/stdio.mjs && chmod +x dist/stdio.mjs
scripts.test:redaction: tsup scripts/test-redaction.ts --format esm --no-splitting --outDir dist/scripts && node dist/scripts/test-redaction.mjs
